 11: #if !defined(SLEPCSCALAPACK_H)
 12: #define SLEPCSCALAPACK_H

 14: #include <slepcsys.h>
 15: #include <petsc/private/petscscalapack.h>

 17: /* ScaLAPACK routines */
 18: #define SCALAPACKgesvd_   PETSCSCALAPACK(gesvd,GESVD)
 19: #if defined(PETSC_USE_COMPLEX)
 20: #define SCALAPACKsyev_    PETSCSCALAPACK(heev,HEEV)
 21: #define SCALAPACKsygvx_   PETSCSCALAPACK(hegvx,HEGVX)
 22: #else
 23: #define SCALAPACKsyev_    PETSCSCALAPACK(syev,SYEV)
 24: #define SCALAPACKsygvx_   PETSCSCALAPACK(sygvx,SYGVX)
 25: #endif

 27: #if defined(PETSC_USE_COMPLEX)
 28: BLAS_EXTERN PetscReal SCALAPACKgesvd_(const char*,const char*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscReal*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscReal*,PetscBLASInt*);
 29: BLAS_EXTERN PetscReal SCALAPACKsyev_(const char*,const char*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscReal*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscReal*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*);
 30: BLAS_EXTERN PetscReal SCALAPACKsygvx_(PetscBLASInt*,const char*,const char*,const char*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscReal*,PetscReal*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscReal*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscReal*,PetscReal*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscReal*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscReal*,PetscBLASInt*);
 31: #else
 32: BLAS_EXTERN PetscReal SCALAPACKgesvd_(const char*,const char*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscReal*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*);
 33: BLAS_EXTERN PetscReal SCALAPACKsyev_(const char*,const char*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscReal*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*);
 34: BLAS_EXTERN PetscReal SCALAPACKsygvx_(PetscBLASInt*,const char*,const char*,const char*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscReal*,PetscReal*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscReal*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscReal*,PetscReal*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscScalar*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscBLASInt*,PetscReal*,PetscBLASInt*);
 35: #endif

 37: #endif
